about_the_game:
DLC allowing you to upgrade the live-action video sections of The Centennial Case: A Shijima Story to 4K ultra high definition.
Please follow the steps below to download the bonus separately.
1. Open your library and select "The Centennial Case: A Shijima Story".
2. Click "Manage DLC", displayed in the DLC section on the right-hand side.
3. Tick the box next to the DLC that you wish to download.
If the game itself is already installed, then following the steps above will install the DLC.
(In order to apply this DLC, you must possess the full game. Furthermore, there must be 36GB or more of available storage in addition to that required for the full game.)

content_descriptors.notes: The Centennial Case: A Shijima Story is a story of life and death. In uncovering the mystery of the Shijima family's chain of inexplicable deaths spanning a century, you will uncover acts of violence, crime and death.  Your investigations will contain imagery of blood, drugs and violence. The game contains adult themes and scenes some may find distressing.
